name: Creational
description: Design patterns that are all about class instantiation or object creation. Which can also have a sub-set of class-creational and object-creational patterns. Where class-creational patterns use inheritance, object-creational patterns use delegation.

name: Structural
description: Design patterns that are about organizing different classes and objects to form larger structures and provide new functionality.

name: Behavioral
description: Design patterns that are about identifying common communication patterns between objects.
